channel.title: Java Virtual Machine?
channel.description:
Hi so basically, like a week or two ago, i was considering starting to code a server, i got my blank server and client, and it was working fine, then few days later when i tried compiling it started giving me this error:
unrecognized option: -d Error: Could not create the Java Virtual Machine. Error: A fatal exception has occurred. Program will exit.
Help?? i re-installed windows 7, un installed and re installed all my java, still says this?! so confused right now

item.title: Java Virtual Machine?
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

arham 4:

Replace the -d in the compiler code with -classpath

-cp

Will do as well.

Read full topic
